Assessment is a process of employee evaluation based on global requirements for a particular job function and level where international committees of experts recommend candidates for promotion to a particular job function and level.Â \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â It is a great tool for driving your career growth, as there are transparent criteria for all levels and job functions and once you feel ready, you submit your request and get ready for your next Level Up!Â Â \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Apart from a standard Assessment process, the Fast Track Assessment (offline review/short session) in testing was launched in 2021.
